PROGRESS REPORT (1.30am) - Initial designs of the office rooms are now done, looking good! Still no name though... ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (3.00am) - Its getting late but the team is still working hard! Only 16 hours to go... ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (7:00pm) - The team working on the game idea... its going to be a long night! ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (9.30pm) - Enough snacks there Dan?‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (11.30pm) - Refining the game idea ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (8.30am) - Team meeting before 3 hour power nap... 13.5 hours gone! ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (7.00am) - 12 hours gone, 12 to go! Game is looking good at the halfway point.. ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (5.30am) - Debugging or eating bananas, which one is it Gus? ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (11.00am) - Back from the power nap and time to get serious! Game name and logo will be chosen soon... 8 hours to go ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (1.30pm) - There that's better Iliyan grin – emotikon Only 5.5 hours to go and the game is looking amazing! ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (7:30pm) - The oculus has arrived! ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (8.30pm) - The design team working hard!‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (5.00pm) - The game is now complete! We are currently recording our demo gameplay, which will be posted soon so stay tuned! only 2 hours to go!! ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (3.30pm) - Adding some finishing touches to the game, we can see the light at the end of the tunnel... 3.5 hours to go! ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬
PROGRESS REPORT (11.45pm) - First win of the night for team Digital Doughnut!! OGR takes the win for the 15 minute website and wins the Dell wireless speakers! ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬

PROGRESS REPORT (11.30am) - Opificium is the name of our game (latin for office) In our game you play as the boss of your own business who has to keep an eye on his workforce in their office's. Some employees will be working productively, either in meetings or working on spreadsheets for example, and others will not be as productive, watching movies or playing games. Its then up to you to fire and rehire others employees with an aim to make your business as profitable as possible! Be sure to find these unproductive employees asap! The more profitable the bigger you can build up your business! 7.5 hours to go! ‪#‎CUCCHack‬ ‪#‎MLHacks‬

PROGRESS REPORT (7.00pm) - COMPLETE! The 24 hours is up and here is our game! We have done excellently to get this much done in 24 hours and have created a fun game that uses the oculus rift from scratch! we plan to continue developing this game in the future... But not before we get some well earned sleep! Thank you to anyone who has followed our journey and we hope you like the look of our game.
In our game you play as the boss of your own business who has to keep an eye on...
